description.zh-cn: 明朝追尊皇帝，明太祖朱元璋的祖父。
description.en: A posthumously honored emperor of the Ming Dynasty, grandfather of Zhu Yuanzhang, the Hongwu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝追尊皇帝，朱初一之父，朱元璋的曾祖父。
description.en: A posthumously honored emperor of the Ming Dynasty, father of Zhu Chuyi and great-grandfather of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 朱四九的配偶，朱初一之母。
description.en: Spouse of Zhu Sijiu and mother of Zhu Chuyi.

description.zh-cn: 朱初一的配偶，朱世珍之母。
description.en: Spouse of Zhu Chuyi and mother of Zhu Shizhen.

description.zh-cn: 朱初一长子，被追封为寿春王。
description.en: The eldest son of Zhu Chuyi, posthumously granted the title of Prince of Shouchun.

description.zh-cn: 朱初一的次子。
description.en: The second son of Zhu Chuyi.

description.zh-cn: 朱初一第四子，明太祖朱元璋之父。
description.en: The fourth son of Zhu Chuyi and father of Zhu Yuanzhang, the Hongwu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元末红巾军起义首领之一，称帝，国号宋。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Red Turban Rebellion in the late Yuan Dynasty, who proclaimed himself emperor of the Song state.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省的县级市，为朱初一的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Jiangsu Province, China, and the birthplace of Zhu Chuyi.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的行政区划，朱初一的迁居地。
description.en: An ancient administrative division in China, where Zhu Chuyi relocated.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省的县，朱初一的迁居地，明祖陵所在地。
description.en: A county in Jiangsu Province, China, where Zhu Chuyi relocated and where the Ming Zuling Mausoleum is located.

description.zh-cn: 明朝皇帝朱元璋为其祖父、曾祖、高祖修建的陵墓。
description.en: The mausoleum built by the Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang for his grandfather, great-grandfather, and great-great-grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个由汉族建立的统一王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China to be ruled by the Han people.

description.zh-cn: 朱初一是朱四九的长子。
description.en: Zhu Chuyi was the eldest son of Zhu Sijiu.

description.zh-cn: 朱初一是恒皇后侯氏之子。
description.en: Zhu Chuyi was the son of Empress Heng (née Hou).

description.zh-cn: 朱初一的配偶是王氏，后被追尊为裕皇后。
description.en: Zhu Chuyi's spouse was Lady Wang, who was posthumously honored as Empress Yu.

description.zh-cn: 朱五一是朱初一的长子。
description.en: Zhu Wuyi was the eldest son of Zhu Chuyi.

description.zh-cn: 朱五二是朱初一的次子。
description.en: Zhu Wuer was the second son of Zhu Chuyi.

description.zh-cn: 朱世珍是朱初一的第四子。
description.en: Zhu Shizhen was the fourth son of Zhu Chuyi.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋是朱世珍之子。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang was the son of Zhu Shizhen.

description.zh-cn: 1363年，韩林儿政权追赠朱初一为光禄大夫、江南等处行中书省平章政事、柱国、司空、吴国公。
description.en: In 1363, the regime of Han Lin'er posthumously honored Zhu Chuyi with the titles of Grand Master for Splendid Happiness, Manager of Governmental Affairs of the Branch Secretariat for Jiangnan and other areas, Pillar of State, Minister of Works, and Duke of Wu.

description.zh-cn: 1368年朱元璋建立明朝后，追尊其祖父朱初一为裕皇帝，庙号熙祖。
description.en: After founding the Ming Dynasty in 1368, Zhu Yuanzhang posthumously honored his grandfather Zhu Chuyi as Emperor Yu with the temple name Xizu.

description.zh-cn: 1368年，朱元璋在南京建立明朝。
description.en: In 1368, Zhu Yuanzhang established the Ming Dynasty in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 朱初一于1256年出生于句容。
description.en: Zhu Chuyi was born in Jurong in 1256.

description.zh-cn: 朱初一迁居至泗州。
description.en: Zhu Chuyi moved his residence to Sizhou.

description.zh-cn: 朱初一迁居至盱眙。
description.en: Zhu Chuyi moved his residence to Xuyi.

description.zh-cn: 朱初一的陵墓是明祖陵。
description.en: Zhu Chuyi's mausoleum is the Ming Zuling.
